Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui

Provides for implementations of a simple GUI for the GView map.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProgressNotifier
    Classes that implement this interface are expected to be able to provide notifications about progress, including the amount of progress and progress messages.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GUIManager  
    GUISettings  
    GUIUtility
    Provides utility for the GUI.
    GViewGUIFrame
    The GUI frame for GView.
    GViewMapManager  
    GViewToolBar
    The default tool bar for the GUI frame.
    ProgressNotification
    This class is intended to be used to show the current status of rebuilding operations on the GViewMap object.
    Style
    This class represents an encapsulation of style information, which may be applied to genome data through the GUIController to create a customized genome visualization.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GUISettings.RenderingQuality  
    GUISettings.SlotNodeDetail  
    GViewMapManager.Layout  

Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui Description

Provides for implementations of a simple GUI for the GView map.
